_sText:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jF9aCMJq_fA
###### Description:
The focus of this map is the ability for you to "draw" your own ways, creating the map,
if you like maze-style maps you'll love playing this map, the team that draws the
map is ramdomly chosen (can repeat sometimes), go down to the basement, choose the Drawing mode
(Free / Reflective), draw (you can hide your drawing of the other team in the option hide map)
Also you can define the HP of players, speed, and the round weapons, back to the balcony press 
the button and enjoy your map.

###### Recommendations:

Does not work with bots, like it may take a while to draw the map, I recommend playing with friends or relatives
because I do not know if people would have patience for a server (not hurt to try), but I suppose, good FPS?,
yes, the map has been tested on a 8400GT when I look from a balcony to another and see all 351 bushes, the FPS
is between 70/75 (elsewhere the FPS rises), but such as many people actually have good video cards I suppose
this won't be a problem.

###### Contains:

-20 spawnpoints
-7 equipament modes
-4 life choices
-3 speeds
-2 drawing panels
-944 entities XD!

If you have any suggests for the second version (like, more weapons, reduce the map and others) comment, but at the same time suggests to remove something
because the map is full of entities, literally one more can give a compilation error, then suggest to put/remove something.

I hope that this different map be well acepted, thank you!

comment, vote, download and see my other work, thanks!
